title: South Dakota State Income Tax Calculator | CalcDomain

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: State taxable income: TI = \max\left(0,\ GI - D_{pre}\right) State tax: T_{state} = \tau \times TI \quad \text{where} \quad \tau = 0 \ \text{(South Dakota)} Perâ€‘period tax: T_{pp} = \dfrac{T_{state}}{N} Effective state rate: e = \dfrac{T_{state}}{GI}

variables.meaning: property tax (annual or monthly depending on input)
